channel.title: [Free] Hosting Servers Legit [Free]
channel.description:
Specs: [center] Memory: 16384MB RAM Available OS Memory: 16128MB RAM Page File: 1920MB used, 30332MB available Processor: AMD Phenom(tm) II X4 975 Processor (4 CPUs), ~3.6GHz[/center]
Note: This is not a scam, this is only going to be temporary unless donations are made.
Servers will be ran 24/7!
Contact Info: Message me on forums I check forums every few hours or so and we'll go from there.

item.title: [Free] Hosting Servers Legit [Free]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I’ll lock it, but I’ll leave the original post there if anyone wants to take his offer up. It is not our responsibility if you get scammed so don’t come whining.

Read full topic

item.title: [Free] Hosting Servers Legit [Free]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:13, topic:433161”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=535882.msg3918140#msg3918140 date=1329423773]

Silent y u no lock.

I couldn’t find a rule against it besides ‘moderators lock at their own discretion’, however if he was selling the host it’d be a different matter.
[/quote]

We all know this is a scam, nobody just gives away a 16GB VPS for free…[/quote]
Yeah, if a majority of us say we think it’s a scam, do you think you could lock it then?

I think it is with you guys.

Read full topic

item.title: [Free] Hosting Servers Legit [Free]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:433161”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=535882.msg3918078#msg3918078 date=1329418271]

What are you hoping to be gaining from this? Just curious.

Nothing I just wanna test my computer and if its good enough i wanna gain donations xD

Good enough to do what? Any computer can host a server, hell, even my dual core phone @ 1.8GHz can.

Show me a vid of you hosting server on ur phone, and logging on it.
[/quote]
Never tried personally, but if an iPod touch can then I’m pretty sure it’s possible, as my phone is far superior, and has less security due to it running Android.

edit: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,382033.0.html[/quote]
I actually did something simular to that in a hotel room two months ago, Motorola Triumph. Worked fairly well.

Read full topic
